abstract: The assent carried a list of conditions, the most important aimed at preventing the new media conglomerate from thwarting competition in online video.
snippet: The assent carried a list of conditions, the most important aimed at preventing the new media conglomerate from thwarting competition in online video.
lead_paragraph: Comcast received government approval Tuesday to acquire NBC Universal, emerging from a lengthy review with a list of conditions, the most important aimed at preventing the new media conglomerate from thwarting competition in online video.

headline.main: Comcast Receives Approval for NBC Universal Merger
headline.print_headline: Comcast Receives Approval For NBC Universal Merger

byline.original: By Tim Arango and Brian Stelter
